posts.postText:
take it off the map rotation...please

its dull and boring and everytime i decide i wanna play ttt and see this map, i just go do something else :/

But its fun to teleport out of the traitor tester behind all the innocents in the testing room and pull off a tun of headshots on unsuspecting noobs :3 I set up the traitor tester as a traitor just so I can do that :D
but I like it. :(
NOOOO!!  I love this map!  Its much needed relief from being raped continuously by the cancerous asshole that is Peach's Castle!
If you haven't played Super Mario 64, you probably wouldn't enjoy it.
Peaches castle is a good map but its overplayed, i think rtv should just go to next map in rotation so we play all maps equally, all my favourite maps are almost never played  :''(

I love that map :D 
We can't remove it
Hmm, haven't ever seen it on that map, and your kry about it...
gah
I hate it, it is boring and pointless, and way too small.

I hate it, it is boring and pointless, and way too small.
 

THIS THIS AND THIS <3
even with Dum's post, I think you are only up to 2 or 3 against pretty much everyone else Kryzoid :(

The map is so stupid though! There aren't any extra places to camp or hide or take cover in except like 50 boring storage compartments all over the place and 3 big buildings all connected by one pipe!

As long as I am with NNJG I will fight to make sure this map never leaves ;P, although the realistic one I am not a fan of.

Oh and as for iceresearch, I haven't played on it often enough to have feelings towards it either way.

Well, another thing i noticed is that except for the center crossway, the pipes that connect each building can only fit one person through. Today, someone chose to go idle right in the middle of one, blocked my passage to get into a room and kill a traitor who recently killed someone, and caused the traitor to kill him and me.
